definitions: relating to or having the effect of predicting an event or result

examples.text: rules are not predictive of behavior

shortDefinitions: relating to or having effect of predicting event or result

definitions: denoting or relating to a system for using data already stored in a computer or mobile phone to generate the letters or words a user is likely to enter next, on the basis of those that have already been entered

examples.text: the virtual keyboard uses predictive text
predictive typing allows you to type faster

shortDefinitions: denoting system for using data already stored in computer to generate letters or words user is likely to enter next
